channel.title: Hey,I'm Hossein Founder of Meetstories.com. It helps SaaS and B2B companies to collect video testimonials and case studies easily
channel.description:
Hi Guys,
It'd Hossein from [Meetstories.com](https://meetstories.com/) I have worked in the Adtech and Martech industry from 2013. I failed a startup in 2014 :) This time I am building meetstories. I help b2b and SaaS companies to collect their video testimonials easily. I relocated to Rotterdam yo launch this startup. Happy yo be hear! Thanks
